turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Farrer & Co.
turn.1: What is known about the law firm Farrer & Co?
turn.2: Farrer & Co Farrer & Co is a British independent law firm headquartered in London, England, serving private individuals, charitable institutions and corporations.
turn.4: They have, over their more than three hundred years of operation, acted for many of the Kings and Queens of England and later Great Britain and the United Kingdom, including Queen Elizabeth II, as well as many leading public figures.
turn.5: What area of specialization does the firm have?
turn.6: The firm operates in three major practice areas; businesses, individuals & families, and charities & institutions.
turn.8: The firm was started in 1701 by Tempest Slinger and his nephew, also named Tempest Slinger.
turn.10: In 1759, Oliver Farrer joined the firm, becoming a partner and the sole proprietor by 1769, and the name Farrer was added to the firm's name.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: From then until 1999, there was always at least one Farrer, and often several, working at the firm.
